name: Chasm (V)
Lore: 'At Cloud City, Luke came face to face with his own destiny. Looking into the abyss, he made his decision.',
Text: 'Plays on table.  Substituted battle destinies do not count against battle destiny limits.  If all your battle destinies were canceled (and not redrawn) use 1 for your total battle destiny instead.  Once per game, may play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect.',
